subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Japanese car manufacturer is set to equip the McLaren team with an engine next year, renewing its Formula One presence after having left the series in 2008 amid the global financial crisis.
snippet: The Japanese car manufacturer is set to equip the McLaren team with an engine next year, renewing its Formula One presence after having left the series in 2008 amid the global financial crisis.
